description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Beijing, China. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Boutique Beijing Mandarin Oriental Courtyard-Style Indulgence with Four Onsite Dining Venues
hotels.description: Find yourself transported to a world of yesteryear Chinese elegance at this traditional hutong courtyard-style sanctuary nestled in the heart of Beijing Central Axis, moments from The Forbidden City. Accentuated by oriental aesthetics and a generous touch of sophistication, the hotel boasts sumptuous accommodation imbued with sleek and stylish amenities, made for modern living. Relish contemporary culinary finesse across the property's dining venues, helmed by renowned chefs, celebrated mixologists and experienced tea sommeliers. Feast on Cantonese and Chaozhou cuisine at Yan Garden by Chef Fei, sample authentic Italian dishes at VICINI, sip on creative drinks at TIAO and drink oriental teas at Maple Lounge. If you wish to explore, Tiananmen Square and the Temple of Heaven are close by.

hotels.title: Beijing Grand Hyatt City Sophistication with Indoor Lagoon Pool & Acclaimed Dining
hotels.description: A lavish Grand Hyatt set within Beijing’s Oriental Plaza, this city landmark elevates the urban hotel experience with soaring interiors, polished service and a showstopping indoor pool set beneath stone grottos. Dining is central to the experience - celebrated Made in China serves legendary Peking duck in a theatre of open kitchens, while The Balcony brings a generous buffet spread. Club Oasis features a sprawling 1,500-square-metre pool that instantly transports you to the tropics, a state-of-the-art fitness centre and a spa offering indulgent body and facial treatments. With elegant interiors that blend East and West and a location that puts the city’s most iconic landmarks within easy reach, it’s a polished base for exploring the capital.

hotels.title: Opulent Beijing Kempinski Stay with Six Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Indulge in timeless European-inspired luxury seamlessly blended with the rich history and traditions of China at Kempinski Hotel Beijing Lufthansa Center. Part of the globally recognised collection of luxe hotels, this elegant property features a long list of glamorous facilities, including a rooftop pool, tranquil gardens and six unforgettable restaurants and bars offering a diverse range of locally and internationally inspired cuisine - including the locally inspired Dargon Palace, and the award-winning Paulaner Bräuhaus. The hotel's major draw is the direct connection to the Lufthansa Center; a vast assembly of luxury shopping, dining and entertainment options.

hotels.title: Elegant South Beijing City Break with Indoor Pool & Three Dining Venues
hotels.description: Experience sleek city living from this high-rise in the heart of the Beijing Economic-Technological Development Area. Set among the headquarters of major global brands, Pullman Beijing South offers a sleek base for business or a quieter retreat from the city centre, while still just a subway ride away from the buzz. After a day of work or wandering Beijing, wind down in style with a glass of wine at the Lobby Lounge or take time to recharge in the indoor heated pool. Savour refined Cantonese and Huaiyang flavours at D'Ming restaurant, or enjoy international favourites at Cafe Mistral - all conveniently at your fingertips.

hotels.title: Central Beijing Escape near Tiananmen Square & Forbidden City with Indoor Pool
hotels.description: Step into the exciting pulse of Beijing from a prime location near the iconic Forbidden City and Tiananmen Square. Explore famed history, stroll along the bustling Wangfujing Street for world-class shopping and dining, and don’t miss the chance to try the city’s legendary Peking Duck. After a day of discovery, retreat to your elegant accommodation and unwind with a cocktail at the Lobby Bar. Relax with a leisurely swim in the indoor pool, or indulge in a touch of European flair with classic French cuisine at Le Cabernet.

hotels.title: Contemporary Beijing Break Near the Great Wall of China with Indoor Pool
hotels.description: Immerse yourself on the outskirts of China's capital with a stay at this idyllic five-star hotel, perfectly positioned within the enchanting Yanqing District, home to the Great Wall of China. Indulge in sumptuous dining across three exquisite onsite eateries, step into a haven of serenity at the spa or plunge into the glittering indoor pool. When you're ready to explore, find yourself in the heart of one of Beijing's trendiest districts, with fashion-forward boutiques and mouthwatering cuisine. Venture out to the nearby Badaling Wildlife Park or head to central Beijing to marvel at the architectural brilliance of the Beijing National Stadium, also known as the Bird's Nest.

hotels.vendor_name: BEI Zhaolong Hotel, in Joie de Vivre by Hyatt
hotels.title: Beijing Sky-High Grandeur near Vibrant Sanlitun District
hotels.description: Where French joviality meets Beijing's electric energy - this hotel brings that signature joie de vivre spark to the heart of the capital. Think boutique soul with metropolitan pride, designed to make you feel like you're in Beijing's best-kept secret. Fuel your morning adventures in the breakfast room before heading out to explore this vibrant city. You're perfectly planted in prime Chaoyang District territory and walking distance from Sanlitun, known for its fashionable dining and nightlife scene. The Forbidden City is also just a metro ride away.

hotels.title: Sky-High Beijing Central Business District Stay with Onsite Restaurant, Pool & Spa
hotels.description: Experience the height of luxury in the heart of Beijing, perfectly positioned in the bustling Central Business District. This elegant five-star retreat is just moments from the historic Forbidden City and Tiananmen Square, offering guests the perfect base to explore the city's rich history. The hotel's location offers easy access to the city's high-end shopping district, with luxury boutiques and international brands just a short stroll away. After a day of retail therapy, relax in the hotel's sophisticated lounge with a cocktail in hand, or indulge in a rejuvenating treatment at Tian Spa.

hotels.title: Shangri-La Sky-High Beijing Escape with Seven Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Indulge in signature Shangri-La luxury at the sky-high, China World Summit Wing, Beijing, ideally located in the city's financial centre. Glide to the 64th floor to find this effortless blend of ultra-modern interiors and traditional Chinese beauty. Seven restaurants and bars will delight foodies with a wide array of culinary delights, from modern European at Grill 79 to traditional Chinese cuisine at Seventh Son. Find serenity in the city at the 78th-floor infinity pool, the state-of-the-art health club and tranquil Chi, The Spa. When you're ready to venture out, China World Shopping Mall is a short elevator ride away and the underground Guomao Subway Station can easily connect you to the capital's iconic sights.
